file_insights.description: New implementation of Exponential Moving Average (EMA) indicator
key_sections: EMA computation with standard and Wilder smoothing
Core algorithm with O(n) time complexity

file_insights.description: Module update to include EMA indicator

patterns_discovered: Implementing mathematical financial indicators with Rust
Flexible generic type implementation for floating-point calculations
Providing multiple computation variants (standard EMA, Wilder EMA)
Comprehensive error handling for edge cases
gotchas_discovered: Providing proper seeding for EMA calculation
Managing NaN values for insufficient lookback data
Converting between Wilder and standard EMA periods
Validating input periods and data lengths
recommendations: Consider benchmarking against other EMA implementations
Potentially create macros for reducing boilerplate in similar indicator implementations
Explore adding more documentation examples covering edge cases
Consider performance profiling with large datasets
